type.name: signature
type.raw:
{
  interaction: InteractionType
  success: boolean
  invalid: boolean
  afterElementHasWidth: TextInputState['afterElementHasWidth']
  beforeElementExists: boolean
}

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

type.description:
Determines the underlying native HTML `<input>` element's `type`.

For more see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/url

id.description: The id of the text input. One is generated if not supplied.

value.description: the selected value (must be accompanied by an `onChange` prop)

defaultValue.description: value to set on initial render

interaction.description:
Specifies if interaction with the input is enabled, disabled, or readonly.
When "disabled", the input changes visibly to indicate that it cannot
receive user interactions. When "readonly" the input still cannot receive
user interactions but it keeps the same styles as if it were enabled.

size.description: The size of the text input.

textAlign.description: The text alignment of the input.

htmlSize.description:
The width of the input (integer value 0 or higher), if a width is not explicitly
provided via the `width` prop.

Only applicable if `display="inline-block"`.

For more see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/size

display.description: The display of the root element.

shouldNotWrap.description:
Prevents the default behavior of wrapping the input and rendered content
when available space is exceeded.

placeholder.description: Html placeholder text to display when the input has no value. This should be hint text, not a label replacement.

isRequired.description: Whether or not the text input is required.

elementRef.description: provides a reference to the underlying html root element

inputRef.description: a function that provides a reference to the actual input element

inputContainerRef.description: a function that provides a reference a parent of the input element

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

renderBeforeInput.description: Content to display before the input text, such as an icon

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

renderAfterInput.description: Content to display after the input text, such as an icon

onBlur.description: Callback fired when input loses focus.

onFocus.description: Callback fired when input receives focus.

margin.description: Margin around the component. Accepts a `Spacing` token. See token values and example usage in [this guide](https://instructure.design/#layout-spacing).

title: TextInput
